choices.name: Get started with research for your Rhode Island ancestors.

hidden.content:
• Learn successful research strategies for Rhode Island ancestors.
  • Record Finder: Use the Record Finder to determine records for Rhode Island research.

content.text:
1. Introduction: Learn about basic Rhode Island research strategies.

    ☆ FS—Basic Rhode Island Research Tips and Strategies

  2. Follow this research study for Rhode Island ancestors, from 1880 to the present.

    ☆ FS—Step-by-Step Rhode Island Research, 1880-Present

  3. Ancestry: Explore resources for Rhode Island research on Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Rhode Island Resources
    ☆ AC—Rhode Island State Research Guide, 5 pgs.

  4. Record Finder: Use the Rhode Island Record Finder to decide on records to search.

    ☆ FS—Rhode Island Record Record Finder

  5. Learn about more resources for Rhode Island research.

    ☆ AA—Rhode Island Research

    6. Additional Records
    1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
    2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
    3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.
    4. Learn about research in colonial Rhode Island.

      ☆ AC—Colonial Rhode Island


    Ethnic
    1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Rhode Island in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Rhode Island

    2. Learn more about African American records.

      ☆ AG—Rhode Island African American Records

    3. Explore the African American Gateway for Rhode Island.
    4. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Rhode Island in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

      ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Rhode Island


Additional Records
  1. Explore a variety of records on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.
  2. Explore historical photo sites on ☆Ancestor Hunt.
  3. Explore resources for school yearbooks on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.
  4. Learn about research in colonial Rhode Island.

    ☆ AC—Colonial Rhode Island

Ethnic
  1. African American: Learn about African Americans in Rhode Island in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: African American Resources for Rhode Island

  2. Learn more about African American records.

    ☆ AG—Rhode Island African American Records

  3. Explore the African American Gateway for Rhode Island.
  4. Native American: Learn about American Indians in Rhode Island in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Indians of Rhode Island

choices.name: Learn about Rhode Island archives and libraries.

hidden.content:
• Explore statewide and regional collections.
  • Explore books and photos that can be helpful in your research.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for archives and libraries. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Rhode Island archives and libraries in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Rhode Island Archives and Libraries
    ☆ Rhode_Island State Archives: Wonderful Local Sources for Genealogical Research

  2. Explore the State Archives and Libraries site for Rhode Island.
  3. Explore the ☆Books We Own site for Rhode Island genealogy publications. Volunteers may be available for lookup services.
  4. Search for ☆free online books on Rhode Island research on the FamilySearch site.
  5. Photos: Explore historical photo resources on the ☆Ancestor Hunt site.

hidden.content:
• Explore city and county directories to find Rhode Island ancestors.
  • Discover the different types of information in directories, such as streets, churches, historical info, etc.

• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for city directories. Then use the learnings for searches for a U.S. ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Learn about Rhode Island city directories in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Rhode Island Directories

  2. Sites: Explore Rhode Island city directories on the Ancestor Hunt site.
  3. Find out more about city directories in this research guide from Ancestry.

    ☆ AC—Six Things to Find—3 pgs.

  4. Explore Rhode Island city directories on the ☆Ancestry site.
  5. Explore Rhode Island ☆historical directories by county.
  6. Explore additional links for Rhode Island city directories on the ☆LDSGenealogy site.

choices.name: Use the QUIKLinks (lightning bolts) or Rhode Island County links (bottom) to quickly search common record collections for Rhode Island.

content.text:
Note : To search records on these sites, you must be registered on the site or be at a FamilySearch Center.

  1. In the QUIKLinks, click the link for FamilySearch, Ancestry, Findmypast, or MyHeritage to view the corresponding record collection.
  2. Scroll down near the bottom of this page to see available county records. Click the name of the county for FamilySearch, or A for Ancestry, or L for Linkpendium.

1. In FamilySearch, explore the Rhode Island Online Genealogy Records page for a variety of record collections.
  2. In each program (FamilySearch, Ancestry, or Findmypast), explore additional record collections besides the ones listed in QUIKLinks.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

content.text:
1. Visit the Rhode Island Genealogy Network page on Facebook.
  2. Visit the Rhode Island Genealogy page on Facebook.
  3. Visit the Rhode Island Genealogical Society page on Facebook.
  4. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for Rhode Island.

Regional Groups

1. Join the RootsChat forum and post questions about Rhode Island research.
  2. Explore the Rhode Island research mailing lists on Cyndi's List.
  3. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about Rhode Island research.

choices.name: Learn about Rhode Island genealogy societies.

hidden.content: • * Proficient: Make a list of Facebook groups, mailing lists, and genealogy societies of interest, and then join or subscribe to them.

content.text:
1. Learn about genealogy societies in Rhode Island in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Rhode Island Societies

  2. Explore the Rhode Island Genealogical Society site.
  3. Explore the Rhode Island Historical Society site.
  4. Explore Rhode Island genealogy society sites on Cyndi's List.
  5. Get help at a family history center in Rhode Island.
